title: Online Arbitrage VA – Amazon FBA Product Sourcing (Video Required | Immediate Hire)
job_overview:
About the Role:
The SupplyHub is a growing U.S.-based Amazon business focused on fast-moving consumer goods in the Grocery, Pet, and Beauty categories. We’re hiring a detail-oriented Online Arbitrage VA to help us source profitable products from U.S. retail websites.

If you're experienced with Keepa, SellerAmp (SAS), and know how to find solid OA leads — this is your chance to join a long-term team and grow with us.

Responsibilities:
Source products from websites like Walmart, Walgreens, CVS, Target, etc.

Analyze products using Keepa & SellerAmp

Submit profitable leads into Google Sheets with full breakdown

Avoid hazmat, restricted, or IP-risk items

Follow SOPs and meet daily/weekly sourcing targets

Requirements:
6+ months experience sourcing for Amazon FBA (Online Arbitrage)

Strong understanding of Keepa & SAS

Familiarity with ROI, BSR, and IP risks

Good English communication & attention to detail

RELIABLE internet and ability to work independently

Preferred (Not Required):
Experience with U.S.-based sellers

Familiarity with categories like Grocery, Pet, or Beauty

Knowledge of reverse sourcing / storefront stalking

Salary & Benefits:
$2.50–$3.50/hr depending on experience

Performance-based raises + bonuses

Weekly payouts via Wise or PayPal

Flexible hours (10–15 hours/week to start)

Long-term, stable role with room to grow
